page.title: 20Games Children Play
page.content:
Games
The most popular{games played by children in our school are soccer, King and games played on the computer. Football is played at playtimes in the yard by the older boys but it is popular because it can be played almost anywhere and all that is needed is a ball. King is played with as many children as you want. One person is on 'it', and he tries to get the other players on to his side by throwing the ball at and hitting the other players. Both boys and girls from our school play this game. Computer games are fast becoming the most popular pastime for children. Just over half the pupils in school now own a home computer
